eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: Things come to a close, but Wei Yenwu and the Grand Tutor still seem to have concerns. Chongyue bids farewell to old acquaintances in the city. He hears bells from the city towers in the great desert beyond Yumen.

attributes.content: How is Mr. Lin doing?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The doctor says he'll be fine.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: It's just that his old injuries and overuse of Arts have taken a toll on him.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Dad is getting old, after all.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Sometimes I forget how long Mr. Lin has served Lungmen.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Dad is not like Chief Wei. As the symbol of Lungmen, Chief Wei always stays in the public eye.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: But Lungmen doesn't exactly want everyone remembering that there is a Rat King of Downtown.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I heard Wei Yenwu dragged you into this.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It became my business when I chose to accept it, of my own accord.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: And it all turned out fine, thanks to a certain someone.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Tsk.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This incident also helped me answer a couple of questions.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Are you going to Victoria? We could travel together.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No, my plans have changed.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'm going back to Lungmen.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What do you mean by 'going back to Lungmen?'
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm staying.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Throwing off your burdens sounds nice, but whatever you throw off, somebody else has to pick up.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Whether one leaves or stays is up to oneself, but someone has to take care of Lungmen.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I said that for me, but feel free to take it as a criticism, if you want.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Glad to see you still have the strength to joke.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The daughter of the Rat King doesn't have to be the Rat King, but it doesn't mean she can't be.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: She could be a different sort of Rat King.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: This time, I made my own choice.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: There are slums in Lungmen, but there shouldn't be. It's a job that someone has to do, no matter how many years go by.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: The times are changing, but no one should be left behind.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I believe that, when it's you saying it.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: By the way...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What is it? Your turn to hem and haw?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Have you seen Wei Yenwu these past few days?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Are you leaving, Grandmaster?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Once I've handed over my duties.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Speaking of which, I must thank you.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: For what?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You chose to trust Yumen.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: And you chose to trust my friends.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: It's all water under the bridge.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: We suffered some losses, but we should count ourselves fortunate that the situation remained under control.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: More importantly, I saw how the people here remain united, even after so many years.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Yumen hasn't changed. Man will triumph over Heaven.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Now I can be at ease about leaving.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: There's no telling when we'll meet again.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Take care, Grandmaster.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You too. Beware the intrigue of the court.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: By the way, you said something about Ch'en's swordsmanship yesterday.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: 'Skillful, but not yet the peak of perfection.'
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Yes, I remember.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Ch'en has talent, but she only just started learning the Chi Xiao style recently.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: She has not mastered its true essence.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Ah, you wanted to show off your skills.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I said before that Cloud-splitting sword is not actually Chi Xiao's ultimate move.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: His fingers are his sword.
A light breeze begins blowing out of nowhere, creating tiny ripples in the teacup.
The ultimate move of Chi Xiao, Heaven's Eye.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The form?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The eye of Heaven sees all and nothing.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The concept?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Only when the clouds are parted is Heaven's wrathful eye revealed.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: One must free one's mind to learn the form.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The obstacle?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Let your heart guide the sword, never looking back.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Turn around, and the sword loses its sharpness, harming the user.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Farewell.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The breeze continues to blow, long after the chair is empty.
The man gazes into the ripples in the teacup, until a smile appears on his face.
I have never seen the likes of it.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Grand Tutor.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: You understand that entering Yumen without permission is enough to carry the suspicion of treason on its own?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: Lord Wei was attacked, and trapped in Yumen, while Yumen travels towards the capital...
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: We were concerned for Lord Wei's safety. The urgency of the situation did not allow for deliberation.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: We have nothing but our lives to repay Lord Wei's kindness.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: Did Wei Yenwu tell you to look for him in Yumen if he did not return in three days?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: That is so.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: I can tell you now that both the assassination attempt on Wei Yenwu and the crisis at Yumen were accidents. There is no need to worry.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: Where were you when the Catastrophe happened?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: We operated in secret, eliminating insurgents stealthily.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: At least you did one thing you were supposed to.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: You may go.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: We are not subject to the Grand Tutor's punishment?
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: As far as the Imperial Guard is concerned, all of you are already dead.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: I never saw you today.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Yes, Grand Tutor.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: You knew.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: From the beginning.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: And you never had any intention of hiding it from me.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Do you not reproach me for overstepping my boundaries?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The situation remained under control thanks to the young envoy that you brought from Lungmen.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The Grand Commandant will soon learn of this incident.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: 'Soon' is not the word I would use.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: This is why I came to Yumen.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: There is no consensus on how we should deal with the bestial Sui, whether we should prepare for war, or reconciliation. It is hard to see the forest when one is amongst the trees.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The minds of some of the parties concerned may no longer be on finding the right answer.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You wanted to help the Lord Exorcist eliminate the insurgents out of a sense of duty to Yan.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: As long as you don't lose sight of it, you won't need me to tell you what to do.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: I will remember your teachings.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You have always been a good student.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: I remember when I taught you and your brother. You were always the quicker learner.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Are you injured?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Just a scratch.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The Tumu Tianshi say it was you who protected the sand sluices.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I let them get away, though.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: By the way, I came to say goodbye.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I will find a place where this sword will realize its potential, even if you're not with me anymore.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I have no doubt you will succeed.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: There is no more hatred between us, but I haven't given up on surpassing you.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I'll come and find you, when I feel ready.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Like I said, anytime you feel ready.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: See you again.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: No regrets?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: What regrets?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Who will she seek if one day It wakes from Its dream, and you and I return to the void?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: She managed to let go of her obsession with vengeance at her age. She will let another one go when I'm gone, and forgotten from her mind.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Then the sky is the limit for her on the path of kung fu.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Well, you are the Grandmaster. You're the authority on kung fu.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Speaking of which, I think you just gave birth to a new legend when you single-handedly turned away the Catastrophe on the walls.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I was drunk. I have no memory of those events.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: When you sober up, raise another flask. Where will you be going?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Where Nian and Dusk went.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The man has been playing against himself the whole afternoon, not speaking or inviting anyone to play against him.
attributes.name: Observer

attributes.content: His moves are brilliant, but eccentric. There were a few that confused me.
attributes.name: Observer

attributes.content: Some Go grandmaster I've never heard of? But why would he come to a place like Yumen?
attributes.name: Observer

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: A man faces a Go board outside a parlor. He is not playing against a manual; he thinks for a long time before each move, as though locked in a struggle against himself.
Black and white pieces intertwine on the rough wooden board, setting into motion a dazzling battle.
Do you know Go?
attributes.name: Go Player

attributes.content: A little.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: What do you think about the board?
attributes.name: Go Player

attributes.content: The battle has been decided in three places. The balance of power is roughly even.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: But white pieces occupy a large area in the center, with no isolated pieces. It seems inevitable that black will lose by half a point...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Look again.
attributes.name: Go Player?

attributes.content: I've taught you.
attributes.name: Go Player?

attributes.content: There is one ko left in the corner.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Keep the ploy and take the last area.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: White is spread out, with more to protect... therefore, more ammunition for my ko.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Voice

attributes.content: The match is not over.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Voice

attributes.content: You won't give up. You'll go on until a winner has been determined.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The Go game doesn't matter. I'm playing against me, in order to determine a winner.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Voice

attributes.content: Your sword taught me a few things. This game state is my gift to you.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Voice

attributes.content: I knew you had pieces around me.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I just didn't know you had already lost faith in humanity then.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Man and beast are different.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Voice

attributes.content: You sealed yourself in the sword in exchange for a human body. You treated yourself as one of them. What became of you in the end?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Voice

attributes.content: All your friends are gone. You wander afar, alone. No one trusts you, no one knows.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Voice

attributes.content: It's not that you don't know the hearts of man. No, you know it all too well. For centuries, you have always been the one most connected to them. How would you not know?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Voice

attributes.content: You could not blend in because you know that the hearts of man are unpredictable. You will always be an outsider.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Voice

attributes.content: All the things you've done since Jie disappeared, you did to find someone to talk to.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: We've been lonely for far too long. We want to find someone to talk to.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Voice

attributes.content: We've fought for so many years. How ironic that we would end up knowing each other best.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You were never my enemy.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Voice

attributes.content: Never once did I consider you my enemy... even if it was you who stopped me then.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Voice

attributes.content: I'll stop you again, if you drag people into your Go game.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Of course you will. Assuming, of course, that you can see the board.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Voice

attributes.content: We'll meet again.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Voice

attributes.content: Farewell, brother.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Voice

attributes.content: Chongyue picks up a white piece and puts it down in a corner.
Slap.
An orthodox, classic move.
General.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: This is...
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: The Grandmaster planned to write the Book of Kung Fu twenty years ago, but the responsibilities of Yumen kept him busy.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Work finally began on it five years ago, with the Grandmaster dictating it to me. I finally finished editing it yesterday.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: It is a record of the Grandmaster's observations and interpretations of all kung fu under Heaven, every school and branch known to man.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Grandmaster wants you to have it.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Grandmaster says that there is much in common between kung fu and medicine. He has included some instructions in the appendix, which he hopes will improve your health.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Where is the Grandmaster?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: He left Yumen an hour ago.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: He says he has already sent away the 'guest', and you will be able to focus on dealing with things after the disaster.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: He regrets not saying goodbye in person.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Why didn't you go with him?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I've been with the Grandmaster since he saved my life ten years ago. I began helping him record the martial arts of the world when I grew up, meeting many great heroes along the way.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: The Grandmaster says that all I need to do is to study all that I've seen and heard during these years, if I wish to pursue the martial arts.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: And if I do not wish to do so, I should go and find something I want to do, now that the Book of Kung Fu is complete.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: 'Life is a long journey.'
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: He has always been like this.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: The more whimsical encounters there are, the more ties one needs to let go of.
Man values formality, beasts value empathy.
Rescue and relief efforts have begun, sir.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: ...The sun is setting.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Oh, the Wangfeng Festival...
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Yesterday was the last day, but the beacon-lighting ceremony was suspended because of the Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Would you like to resume it?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: The wizened general gazes beyond the city and sees nothing but sand.
I will beat the drum myself.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Sir, you've been in the tower all day. You should rest. We'll take care of it.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: The journey is long. Someone should see him off.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: All your companions have returned. Where do you fly off to, alone?
The drumbeats begin.
They are heavy, ringing clear and far.
Seventeen beats of the drum, representing the trials and tribulations that befell Yumen the past year, both big and small.
The Catastrophe has passed. The storm has swept away the many colors in the sky.
The clouds burn bright red, scorched by the setting sun.
He walks forward, the wind and sand slowly wiping away his footprints. The great city of Yumen grows smaller in the distance.
Thump—
Eighteen.
He stops briefly, but does not turn.
The eighteenth beat of the drum, symbolizing yet another Catastrophe survived by Yumen.
And...
I'll be going.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.text: Break clouds by rays on all that be,
\nAre scooped the stars 'til star's bed fades, and like another, we are lone.

attributes.content: We made it out.
attributes.name: Anxious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Thank you for digging up the Patrol Battalion's activities, or we would have been goners inside.
attributes.name: Anxious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: We got a message by Di beast. Boss and the others have set out for the next location. We should hurry and meet up with them.
attributes.name: Calm Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: (Grinds teeth)
attributes.name: Calm Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Yumen... next time...
attributes.name: Calm Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Hey, isn't that the one who...?
attributes.name: Anxious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: You followed us?
attributes.name: Calm Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Followed? I just stopped to take a break on my way out of Yumen.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: But I guess fate meant for us to meet again.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Perfect. I'll send you on your way.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: And then I'll be on mine.
attributes.name: Qiubai
